bibl.title: Landholders, Rents, and Crops in a Ptolemaic Village: P. Heid. Dem. inv. 46.
bibl.note: Fayyum, third to second century BCE.

bibl.title: A Good Scribe and an Exceedingly Wise Man. Studies in Honour of W.J. Tait

bibl.seg: Andrew Monson, Landholders, Rents, and Crops in a Ptolemaic Village: P. Heid. Dem. inv. 46.

A.M. Dodson, J.J. Johnston & W. Monkhouse (edd.), Demotic Consultant C.J. Martin, A Good Scribe and an Exceedingly Wise Man. Studies in Honour of W.J. Tait = GHP Egyptology. 21 (London, 2014) pp. 229-240, 2 tabl., 1 fig., 2 pll.
Fayyum, third to second century BCE.
